Articles.Content: Hello, I was just wondering if the RO configs for the SOCK shuttle work even without RO? I have both FAR and Real-Fuels installed.

How to show non-RO parts in game?

I upgraded my game from 1.10.x to 1.12.3, most issues to my save are fixed, except that some parts are missing, and I failed to figure out how to make the game to load those parts.

I used robotic parts from stock DLC in vessels(such as hinges and grip strips), but I can not find those parts anywhere.

2 hours ago, Xavier513 said:

How to show non-RO parts in game?

I upgraded my game from 1.10.x to 1.12.3, most issues to my save are fixed, except that some parts are missing, and I failed to figure out how to make the game to load those parts.

I used robotic parts from stock DLC in vessels(such as hinges and grip strips), but I can not find those parts anywhere.

OK, fixed, I added some cfg to RO, marked these parts with "RSSROConfig = True", then they are shown in game.
